TopicTitle: Can we have a graveyard please ?

Articles.Content:
Does anybody remember an old 16 bit game called Cannon Fodder ? It was essentially a 2d scroller with little soldiers. The main menu page was a picture of this green hill next to the recruiting building, and that hill would acquire gravestones as you reckless got your men slaughtered.

Could we have one of those? A graveyard next to the astronaut complex that filled up as brave Kerbals give their life to science.
I think it's be better to have a hospital and the "imagination" that Kerbals are near indestructible (no war, not afraid of rockets etc explained by this).
Funny idea, but how about not? Because the resulting acres would be too much for the CPU to handle...

The resulting acres would be too much for the CPU to handle...

And it would become impossible to land at KSC every again
